title: Everyday, Boss Is Pretending To Be Weak - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Clingy Lover   Cultivation   Cute Story   Disabilities   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Magic Formations   Manipulative Characters   Manly Gay Couple   Marriage of Convenience   Military   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R*pe   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Time Skip   Transmigration   Transported Modern Structure   Transported to Another World   Vampires   Werebeasts   Witches
author: Feng Jiu   封玖
description:
Young Master He had always been a male god in the eyes of others.

Until one day, the god-like him died.

And he became the much detested white silk trouser-wearing rich second generation.

Male God He was unaffected by this. 

In his previous life, he had sacrificed everything for his clan, now, he could finally break free from that tiring life.

The only thing was that he had gained a handicapped partner.

Initially, he thought his partner was just a weak, gullible and pure lamb.

In the end, a certain person changed entirely making everybody cry and shout daddy.>
